title: Reviews and recommendation supporting listing of the Cook Inlet population of Beluga whale
creator: Post, Roger A.
description: A detailed review and recommendation by the Alaska Chapter of The Wildlife Society supporting the listing of the Cook Inlet population of beluga whales as endangered under the Alaska Endangered Species Act, citing genetic isolation, population decline, and threats from overharvesting and environmental factors.
subject: correspondence; Alaska Department of Fish and Game
